resources.string: You are not connected to internet
The server cannot or will not process the request, please try again
The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future
The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy
The server timed out waiting for the request, please try again
The request was directed at a server that is not able to produce a response
The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request
You dont have internet connection, plese try again
You lost internet connection, plese try again
